unnormalised: Breaking: India vs. Pak T20 World Cup match, originally scheduled for 15/10/2024 at 7:30 PM IST, might get prepone to avoid clashing with Karwa Chauth! Wives across India are reportedly threatening nationwide hunger strike if hubby dearests even THINK of watching cricket instead of moon-gazing. A BCCI official quipped, "Happy wife, happy life, right? We’ll ‘discuss’ it."
normalised: Breaking: India versus Pak T two zero World Cup match, originally scheduled for fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four at seven thirty P M I S T, might get prepone to avoid clashing with Karwa Chauth! Wives across India are reportedly threatening nationwide hunger strike if hubby dearests even THINK of watching cricket instead of moon-gazing. A B C C I official quipped, "Happy wife, happy life, right? We’ll ‘discuss’ it."

unnormalised: Sources say that the rescheduling is also being 'strongly suggested' by saree retailers who anticipate a major dip in sales if the match remains on the same day. Rumours suggest a potential change to 14/10/2024 or even a radical 2 PM kickoff on the 15th, so guys can catch the tail end after satisfying their wives.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Pakistani fans are crying foul, claiming a 'fixed match' even before it begins. "Yeh toh unfair hai! Pehle match fix, ab date fix?" exclaimed a frustrated fan from Lahore. The final call, expected by 30/09/2024, has everyone holding their breath…and possibly fasting preemptively, just in case.
